dict.string: Get List of KM Variables and Size @KM @Tool
FOR EA: Variable in KM Variables Collection
IF: Exclude Local and Instance Variables
FILTER: Process Tokens to Get Variable Contents
FILTER: Get Size (# of chars) of Variable
SCRIPT: Sort Variable List by Variable Size, Descending
# SORT on 1st Field, Descending, As Number sort -r -n
